HeroSection.title: Best Car Wash & Service
HeroSection.subtitle: With Quality Assurance and Free Services

features.title: Lifelines Waxes
features.description: We have a contract with Lifelines for high-quality waxes with nano-technology and zero salt.

features.title: Filtered Water
features.description: We use fresh and filtered water to ensure a spotless clean for your vehicle.

features.title: Detailed Washing Process
features.description: Our process includes a preparatory and wax phase, with separate towels for the car body, glass, and interior.

features.title: Free Services
features.description: Enjoy complimentary services like car freshener and floor mat bagging with every wash.

features.title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
features.description: If you're not satisfied with your car wash, we will re-wash it for free.

features.title: Loyalty Program
features.description: Get your 5th car wash free after every 4 washes with our loyalty program.

features.title: 24/7 Service
features.description: Our car wash is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for your convenience.

features.title: Genuine Oils & Filters
features.description: We use original and certified oils from main agents, and all our filters are genuine.

features.title: Competitive Pricing
features.description: Enjoy wholesale prices on oils with a minimal service fee of just 10 SAR.

features.title: Specialized Equipment
features.description: We use advanced equipment for services like transmission and radiator flushes.

features.title: Expert Technicians
features.description: Our team consists of professional and specialized technicians to handle your car with care.

features.title: Tire Services
features.description: We offer a wide range of tires from all major brands at wholesale prices, plus thermal patching.

features.title: Free Engine Polishing
features.description: Get a complimentary engine polishing service after every oil change.

features.title: Comfortable Lounges
features.description: Relax in our air-conditioned lounges with beverages and a direct view of your car being serviced.

features.title: Extended Hours
features.description: We are open from 6 AM to 2 AM to accommodate your schedule.

promises.title: Customer Satisfaction First
promises.description: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We are committed to exceeding your expectations with every visit.

promises.title: High-Quality Services
promises.description: We guarantee the highest quality in all our services, from car washes to maintenance.

promises.title: Free Services Package
promises.description: Every customer receives a package of complimentary services to enhance their experience.

ContactSection.title: Contact Us
ContactSection.description: We are available 24/7. Connect with us via WhatsApp or follow us on our social media channels.

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

LocaleLayout.name: Mesfah | Best Car Wash & Service Centers
LocaleLayout.description: Mesfah offers the best car wash and service in Riyadh. We use nano-wax, filtered water, genuine oils, and professional technicians to ensure the highest quality. With free services and a special loyalty program.

Footer.companyDescription: Mesfah is your premier destination for car wash and service in Riyadh. We are committed to providing the highest levels of quality and care for your vehicle.
